description:
Darren Star's next TV project is an adaptation of a book -- no surprise there, considering his work as creator of "Sex and the City" and executive producer of "GCB" and "Kitchen Confidential," both of which were based on books.Darrent Star的下一步电视剧作品将会是根据小说改编而来。不过这也是情理之中，他之前曾经是《欲望都市》制作人、《GCB》和《Kitchen Confidential》的执行制片人，这些作品都是根据小说改编而来。

Star will develop an adaptation of "The Honest Toddler," a newly published book based on the website and Twitter feed of writer Bunmi Laditan, Star的新作将会改编自Bunmi Laditan在Twitter和网络上很火的著作《The Honest Toddler》。

The Honest Toddler purports to be observations of life and the strange behavior of adults through the eyes of a 2-year-old. 《The Honest Toddler》将会从一个2岁大的孩子的视角来看世界，在他们的视角里其实大人的很多行为都是很奇怪的。

Laditan will executive produce the show with Star, Clark Peterson and Dennis Erdman. It's expected to be pitched to broadcast and cable networks. 而书作者Laditan将会在Star、Clark Peterson和Dennis Erdman的这部剧中出任执行制片人。
